title: Predict the house price.
description: A real estate company wants to predict house prices based on historical data. You are given a dataset containing features like number of rooms, area (in square feet), number of bathrooms, location rating, and age of the house.

parts.description:
Part 1: Preprocessing

Handle missing values and outliers in the dataset. After processing, print the `.info()` summary of your cleaned training dataframe to confirm the changes.

Part 2: Model Training

Train a Linear Regression model. Evaluate its performance and print the RÂ² score for the training data in the exact format 'R-squared Score: 0.7130'.

Part 3: Prediction

Using your trained model, predict the prices for the test dataset and save the final predictions to 'submission.csv'.
